column4: Is it possible for MacOS X and Linux to co exist? Ideally I would say 5GB MOSX, 5GB Ubuntu, 200GB storage, question is which format that both OSes can write to
he asked you what format they can both read and write to. Not how they can "co-exist".
you can read from ext3 using Mac OSX. http://forums.macosxhints.com/archive/index.php/t-61597.html
